channel.title: Runescape is fine
channel.description:
Well, alot of people complain about you can't merch and pk.
Lets look at it from a non-pure point of view.
Pking stands for player killing. This means: -Duel area Staking is fine, its even. -Bounty hunter Still able to get loot + MONEY. -Clan wars Oh come on, if you've made a server before you've aleast tried this.
Now, when wild was there. -Unfair kills. People who team you when its a one-on-one. Okey, so mabye you should fight in edge but still. -Lures Luring is gone(hoorraaay)!
No more pures? -Clan wars You purey clans can still fight. -Bounty hunter Its teaming still right?
Now, merching isn't gone. I've made 100ks in about 20mins with the grand exchange.
Post your points and views.
NOTE: Do NOT bother flaming.

item.title: Runescape is fine
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

Also, it saves you world hopping and you basicly do overnight trading if you leave it.

Read full topic
